params.about_text:
My name is Rohit, belongs to Rewari, a district in Haryana,

Currently, I'm pursuing 'Btech(Cse)' from IP Delhi,

I have done my 12 in 2017 from Holy Child Public School, Rewari.

Coming to my strength I'm self-motivated, a quick learner,

Now coming to my family background we are four members in my family including me my father is a Service Man and my mother is a Homemaker.

I have one elder brother who is doing Job in private sector.

My hobbies  Cooking, Traveling, Gyming.

I'm glad to share my first blog which I prepare it by using flask
